entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brochet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:55 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
